message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $120 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $140.  Let's meet in the middle and make this deal happen.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not able to go above $120 for the product. I would like to stick to my original offer.
